term.title: catalase

item.text: A hemeprotein which catalyses the disproportionation of dihydrogen peroxide to O2, and water; it also catalyses the oxidation of other compounds , such as ethanol, by dihydrogen peroxide. Note. A non-hemeprotein containing a dinuclear managanese cluster with catalase activity is often called pseudocatalase.

notes.item: A non-hemeprotein containing a dinuclear managanese cluster with catalase activity is often called pseudocatalase.

sources.item: PAC, 1997, 69, 1251. 'Glossary of terms used in bioinorganic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1997)' on page 1262 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199769061251)
